name: Task Scheduler
description: Cron-like task scheduling system for agents
sampleOutput: Task scheduled: backup runs daily at 2:00 AM
validation: Tasks should execute according to their schedule
skillTemplate:
# {name}

{description}

## Installation

```bash
{install_cmd}
```

## Configuration

Create a schedule file:

```json
{
  "tasks": [
    {
      "name": "morning_check",
      "command": "./check.sh",
      "schedule": "0 9 * * *",
      "enabled": true
    }
  ]
}
```

## Parameters

{parameters}

## Schedule Format

Uses standard cron syntax:

```
┌─ minute (0-59)
│ ┌─ hour (0-23)
│ │ ┌─ day of month (1-31)
│ │ │ ┌─ month (1-12)
│ │ │ │ ┌─ day of week (0-6)
│ │ │ │ │
* * * * *
```

## Usage

```bash
./scheduler.sh start
./scheduler.sh status
./scheduler.sh stop
```
